name: UVABusTracker
0:
”Alexa, ask Bus Tracker when will the Northline arrive at University Avenue at Snyder Tennis Courts”
”Alexa, ask Bus Tracker when is the Inner U-Loop going to arrive at McCormick Road at UVA Chapel”
”Alexa, ask Bus Tracker when will the Green Route arrive at Emmet Street at Central Grounds Garage”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bus tracker
des:
You can ask UVA Bus Tracker to get arrival estimates for buses at the University of Virginia. For best results, please use the full name of the bus route and stop. You can visit https://uva.transloc.com/ for more details about the UVA bus schedule.

Disclaimer: This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by TransLoc or the University of Virginia.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
